attributes.action: call upon the Planning Minister to delete Kennet Meadows as a development area from the South East Regional Plan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kennet Meadows is a functional flood plain. The Environment Agency say that building there could result in floods in central Reading. We wish to see the Kennet Flood Plain protected in line with existing planning policies.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call upon the Planning Minister to delete Kennet Meadows as a development area from the South East Regional Plan."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15193.asp

Prime Minister's Office
